content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts items into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the required sub-ingredients available in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plate is needed to craft iron-gear-wheels, and it must be available in sufficient quantity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
